name: My Corridor
description:
Resume

This is one of my school work ! I had to make a "corridor" with approx. 30 Sec. experience.  For this work, we didnt have to do Uv and Texture.

Tasks

- Make a mood board.

- Find references.

- Make 3D modular models.

- Clean 3D models.

- Make a 30 secondes experience.

- Make Lighting

- Make Post Processing

- Make an event

Credits

On Tv Screen: The last night.

Music: The last night.
